```{r, message = F, warning = F, echo = F}
library(tidyverse)
library(here) 
library(readxl) 
library(janitor)
library(knitr)
library(stringr)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(lubridate)
library(scales)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
Sys.setenv(TZ="America/Guadeloupe")
```


```{r}
monitoring <- read_excel(here("nursery_monitoring", "data", "outplant_data.xlsx"), sheet = "monitoring") %>%
  separate(id, into = c("species", NA), sep = 4, remove = F)
```

```{r}
ggplot(monitoring %>% filter(date == as.Date("2022-09-05")),
       aes(x = id, y = p_survival)) +
  geom_col() +
  facet_grid(.~site)

```
